casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Shawn Christopher PORTER. No. 341P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2006. Keischa M. Lovelace, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Porter. Sharon Patrick-Wilson, Special Deputy Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 26th day of June 2006 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th day of August 2006."
